title: WaterNetwork - Pattern
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of a generic pattern made for the Water Network Management domain. This entity is primarily associated with the water management vertical and related IoT applications.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be Pattern

multipliers.description: Property. Multipliers define how some base quantity (e.g., demand) is adjusted for each time period

timeStep.description: Property. The time step used for the multipliers. All units are accepted in [CEFACT](https://www.unece.org/cefact.html) code. Units:'Second'

startTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Time'. The time at which the pattern starts

tag.description: Property. An optional text string used to assign the junction to a category, such as a pressure zone
